org.ldaptive

Interface Operation<Q extends Request,S>

  • Type Parameters:
    Q - type of ldap request
    S - type of ldap response
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAsyncOperation, AbstractOperation, AddOperation, AsyncSearchOperation, BindOperation, CancelOperation, CompareOperation, DeleteOperation, FastBindOperation, MergeOperation, ModifyDnOperation, ModifyOperation, PasswordModifyOperation, SearchOperation, WhoAmIOperation

    public interface Operation<Q extends Request,S>
    Interface for ldap operations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Response<S> execute(Q request)
      Execute this ldap operation.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        Response<S> execute(Q request)
                    throws LdapException
        Execute this ldap operation.
        Parameters:
        request - containing the data required by this operation
        Returns:
        response for this operation
        Throws:
        LdapException - if the operation fails
